item.title: Run MySQL Server on Docker - Development
item.description: While developing application on your machine, you don’t really need to run them on the host. So instead of that, you can rely on running them on docker. As a first step, you can use the below command to run mysql server in the background service as a daemon: docker run --name mysql-dev -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -p 3306:3306 -d mysql verify the service: âžœ docker ps CONTAINER ID IMAGE COMMAND CREATED STATUS PORTS NAMES 6ed804fdd24a mysql "docker-entrypoint.
